title: gccgo: accepts program with invalid identifier
body:
gccgo successfully compiles the following program:
```
package n
func _(t)
```
while gc and go/types say:
```
go.go:2: undefined: t
go.go:2:8: undeclared name: t
```
gccgo must reject this program.

gcc version 6.0.0 20150702 (experimental) (GCC)
